summary: This bill, the "Protecting Endowments from Our Adversaries Act," amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax on certain investments of private colleges and universities. The bill targets investments in entities on lists maintained by the Secretary of Commerce and the FCC, which are considered "listed investments".  The tax includes a 50% tax on the fair market value of acquisitions and a 100% tax on net income from 1-year listed investments. It also defines "specified educational institution" and outlines effective dates for the changes.
